availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Cumberland County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Mary Thomas. Father of Elizabeth E. Thomas, Samantha M. Thomas, and Louisa Ann Thomas. Farmer in Cumberland County in 1860. Enslaved one person in Cumberland County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, District No. 1, p. 40. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, District No. 1, p. 3.
